title: Cutchi Memons Act, 1938
description: Official consolidated text of Cutchi Memons Act, 1938 (X of 1938) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement
provisions.content: (1) This Act may be called the Cutchi Memons Act,

provisions.title: Section 2. Cutchi Memons to be governed in certain matters by 1[Muslim] Law
provisions.content:
Subject to the
provisions of section 3, all Cutchi Memons shall, in matters of succession and inheritance, be
governed by the 1[Muslim] Law.

provisions.title: Section 3. Saving
provisions.content:
Nothing in this Act shall affect any right or liability acquired or incurred before
its commencement, or any legal proceeding or remedy in respect of any such right or liability; and
any such legal proceeding or remedy may be continued or enforced as if this Act had not been
passed.

provisions.title: Section 4. 2[Repeal.]
provisions.content:
___________
Date: 01-08-2024
1
Subs. by Federal Adaptation of Laws Order, 1975, (P. O. 4 of 1975) Art 2 and Table.
2
